    • Class DotButton extends javax.swing.JButton implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • color

          int color
          The cell colors. Valid values are GameModel.COLOR_0, GameModel.COLOR_1, ... , GameModel.COLOR_5

        • iconSize

          int iconSize

        • row

          int row
          The coordinate of this cell on the Board.

        • column

          int column
          The coordinate of this cell on the Board.

    • Class DotInfo extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • x

          int x
          The coordinate of this DotInfo.

        • y

          int y

        • color

          int color
          The initial color at (x,y)

        • captured

          Is that location captured ?

    • Class GameModel extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • currentSelectedColor

          int currentSelectedColor
          The current selection color

        • sizeOfGame

          int sizeOfGame
          The size of the game.

        • model

          DotInfo[][] model
          A 2 dimentionnal array of sizeOfGame*sizeOfGame recording the state of each dot

        • numberOfSteps

          int numberOfSteps
          The number of steps played since the last reset

        • numberCaptured

          int numberCaptured
          The number of captered dots

        • generator

          java.util.Random generator
          Random generator

        • torus

          boolean torus
          Booleans used to track user options for gameplay style

        • diagonal

          boolean diagonal
          Booleans used to track user options for gameplay style

    • Class GameView extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable
